Package plptool

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PLPSyntaxHighlightSupport
    This class is the interface to the PLPTool syntax highlighting system.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArchRegistry
    This class associates an ISA implementation to its member classes.
    Config
    PLPTool configuration
    Constants  
    Msg
    PLPTool messaging utility class.
    PLPArchitecture
    This abstract class serves as a skeleton for the ISA's metaclass.
    PLPAsm
    PLPTool assembler abstract.
    PLPAsmSource
    This class implements an assembly source and its data structures used by PLPAssembler.
    PLPBuildError
    This class represents an error that occurred during a build process of a program (either with an assembler or compiler).
    PLPLinker
    2.3.
    PLPSerialProgrammer
    PLP Serial Programmer abstract class.
    PLPSimBus
    This class implements the simulation core bus / front-side bus.
    PLPSimBusModule
    This is an abstract for a general purpose module that can be attached to the front-side bus.
    PLPSimCore
    This abstract class defines the simulated CPU interface.
    PLPSimCoreGUI  
    PLPSimRegModule
    PLP Register module.
    PLPToolbox  
    Text
    This class holds text strings for PLP Tool
    ThreadSync  
    Version
